content.new:
Make it possible to change the frame of a link/joint without the link joint. This would allow to simulate mecanum wheels ([see here how](http://www.forum.coppeliarobotics.com/viewtopic.php?f=9&t=390#p1380)).

This functionality is close to [simResetDyn
content.old:
Make it possible to change the frame of a link/joint without the link joint. This would allow to simulate mecanum wheels.

This functionality is close to [simResetDynamicObject](http://www.coppeliarobotics.com/helpFiles/en/apiFunctions.htm#simResetDyna

issue.title: Change frame of a link/joint without moving the link joint
